VASSAL.launch

Class TilingHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • VASSAL.launch.TilingHandler

  • public class TilingHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    A launcher for the process which tiles large images.
    Since:
    3.2.0

                     java.awt.Dimension tdim,
                     int mhlim,
                     int pid)
        Creates a TilingHandler.
        Parameters:
        aname - the path to the ZIP archive
        cdir - the tile cache diretory
        tdim - the tile size
        pid - the id of the child process
